contents.text: Thank you for calling Everlane in San Francisco, where we deliver exceptional quality, ethical manufacturing, and radical transparency.
For order and returns support, press 1.
For order status and tracking updates, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an order specialist.

navigationGoals: Get current status and tracking details for my recent Everlane order.
I need to track the delivery status of the veteran discount jacket I ordered.
I need the real-time tracking data and ETA for my recent Everlane order using the tracking number.
I’d like to check the delivery status of my recent order.
I’d like an update on the shipping status and tracking number for my recent Everlane order.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to returns and exchanges support.

navigationGoals: Arrange a return or exchange for a recently purchased item.
I want to exchange the field pants I bought with the veteran discount for a larger size.
I want to initiate an RMA for my order and get a prepaid return label to exchange for a different size.
I need to return a jacket I bought and exchange it for a larger size.
I need to initiate a return for the merino sweater I bought and exchange it for a smaller size.

contents.text: To learn about our products and sustainability practices, press 2.
To learn about our sustainable materials and latest collections, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our product information team.

navigationGoals: Learn about Everlane’s sustainable materials and see their latest collection.
I’m looking for information on your new sustainable cotton shirt and its available sizes.
I’m looking for detailed specs on your new recycled nylon collection, including material composition and lifecycle analysis.
I want information on the eco-friendly materials in your latest collection.
I’m calling to learn about the sustainable materials used in your latest collection.

contents.text: To hear about our ethical factories and transparency reports, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sustainability and transparency experts.

navigationGoals: Access Everlane’s factory ethics information and transparency reports.
I want to review your ethical factory practices and transparency reports.
I need access to your factory audit reports and supply chain compliance data for your ethical manufacturing process.
I’d like to learn about your factory practices and access your transparency reports.
I’d like details on your ethical factory partners and how to access your most recent transparency report.
